H0.text: Fins are the feature that causes a student who finds an animal in the wild to determine that it is a bird.

H1.text: Scales are the feature that causes the student to identify the animal in the wild as a bird.

H2.text: Feathers are the feature that causes the student who finds an animal in the wild to identify it as a bird.

H3.text: Four legs is the characteristic that makes the student decide the animal he found in the wild is a bird.

A4.text: Feathers are among the characteristics that distinguish the extant birds from other living groups.
